result.markdown: --- title: "GitHub Actions Series: Making awesome automations" subtitle: "Here is a list of posts about GitHub Actions" author: "Beatriz Milz" date: "2022-06-29 " categories: ["Git", "GitHub", "GitHub Actions", "Automations", "RStudio"] image: "featured.png" toc: true draft: false --- Here you can find a series of posts about GitHub Actions, which are complementary material for my talk at the RStudio Conference. - Comming soon! > Post updated in 2022-06-29.
